com.chbase.request

Class SimpleRequestTemplate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chbase.request.SimpleRequestTemplate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RequestTemplate

    public class SimpleRequestTemplate
extends java.lang.Object
implements RequestTemplate
    This RequestTemplate fills in the details to call HealthVault and receive the response. Offline means the user is not logged in and we do not have access to the user token. Fill in the user id, their record, and make the call.
